description: Adds conveniences for developers when maintaining the freeCodeCamp curriculum.
fccDevTools.defaultHost.description: Default host to use if not specified.
fccDevTools.simpleBrowser.description: If to use the built-in simple browser. (Doesn't work very well for freeCodeCamp.)
fccDevTools.interpolateEnvironmentVariab: If to interpolate environment variables in the host string.
fccDevTools.interpolateCommands.descript: If to interpolate system commands in the host string.
